summary: Aviation refers to flying using an aircraft, like an aeroplane.
full_text: Aviation is the practical aspect or art of aeronautics, being the design, development, production, operation and use of aircraft, especially heavier-than-air aircraft. The word "aviation" was coined by French writer and former naval officer Gabriel La Landelle in 1873, from the verb "avier" , itself derived from the Latin word "avis"  and the suffix "-ation".
title: Aviation
